title: Stir-fried beef salad with mango
ingredients: ['450g (1lb) lean sirloin steak', '3 garlic cloves, finely chopped', '1 tsp caster sugar', '2 tsp low-sodium soy sauce', '1½ tbsp sunflower oil', 'For the dressing', '2 tsp paprika', '2 tsp mild chilli powder', '1½ tbsp clear honey', '2.5cm (1in) piece fresh root ginger, grated', '4 tbsp rice vinegar', 'juice of 1 lime or 1 lemon', 'For the salad', '¼ medium red cabbage', '½ cucumber', '½ red pepper', '1 mango, peeled, stoned and cut into strips', '2 plums, sliced', '55g (2oz) watercress leaves', '3–4 spring onions, chopped', 'fresh mint and coriander leaves', '2 tbsp chopped roasted unsalted peanuts']
